statements: SELECT * FROM biometric_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, session_duration FROM biometric_data;
SELECT session_id, body_temperature FROM biometric_data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, session_duration FROM biometric_data WHERE body_temperature < 98.6;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data ORDER BY session_id DESC, heart_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY session_duration DESC;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM biometric_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(heart_rate) > 70;
SELECT session_id, MAX(body_temperature) AS max_temp FROM biometric_data WHERE body_temperature < 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, ROUND(AVG(session_duration), 2) AS avg_session_duration FROM biometric_data GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE session_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY heart_rate ASC, body_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT session_id, session_start, session_end FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT patient_id, body_temperature FROM patient_data WHERE body_temperature BETWEEN 98.6 AND 99.5;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, therapist_notes FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, body_temperature, session_date FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT heart_rate, body_temperature, session_date, patient_id FROM patient_data ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate, MIN(body_temperature) AS min_body_temperature, MAX(body_temperature) AS max_body_temperature FROM patient_data GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.heart_rate, p.body_temperature, s.session_start, s.session_end, s.therapist_name FROM patient_data p INNER JOIN therapy_sessions s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count, therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions GROUP BY patient_id, therapist_name HAVING session_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_biometric_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM patient_biometric_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, session_date FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT exercise_name, reps_completed, weight_used FROM therapy_exercises WHERE reps_completed >= 10 AND weight_used > 20;
SELECT therapist_id, session_duration FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_biometric_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapist_id, session_date, session_duration FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY session_duration ASC;
SELECT exercise_name, reps_completed, weight_used, duration FROM therapy_exercises WHERE reps_completed >= 10 AND weight_used > 20 ORDER BY exercise_name ASC, weight_used DESC;

SELECT * FROM patient_biometric_data JOIN therapy_sessions ON patient_biometric_data.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id WHERE patient_biometric_data.timestamp > '2022-06-01' AND therapy_sessions.session_date < '2022-07-01';

SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, MIN(blood_pressure) AS min_blood_pressure FROM patient_biometric_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_heart_rate > 120 AND min_blood_pressure < '120/80';
SELECT * FROM patient_biometric_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_biometric_data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT therapist_id, session_date FROM physical_therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 101;
SELECT exercise_name, difficulty_level FROM exercises ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT session_id, exercise_id, completion_status FROM exercise_logs WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM patient_biometric_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure, temperature FROM patient_biometric_data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM physical_therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 3 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, exercise_name, duration_minutes FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT session_id, exercise_id, completion_status FROM exercise_logs WHERE completion_status = TRUE AND session_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_information;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM therapist_information ORDER BY therapist_name ASC;
SELECT exercise_name, recommended_repetitions, difficulty_level FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level >= 3;
SELECT session_date, session_duration FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_duration < 60;
SELECT * FROM patient_information WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, weight FROM patient_information WHERE gender = 'Male' AND height > 170 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_information WHERE height < 160 AND weight > 60 ORDER BY patient_name ASC

SELECT therapy_sessions.session_id, patient_information.patient_name, therapist_information.therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions JOIN patient_information ON therapy_sessions.patient_id = patient_information.patient_id JOIN therapist_information ON therapy_sessions.therapist_id = therapist_information.therapist_id WHERE therapist_information.specialization = 'Physical Therapy' ORDER BY session_date DESC

SELECT biometric_data.data_id, exercises.exercise_name, exercises.recommended_repetitions, biometric_data.heart_rate FROM biometric_data JOIN exercises ON biometric_data.session_id = exercises.exercise_id WHERE biometric_data.heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY biometric_data.heart_rate DESC
